titles.title: He's A Wonderful Saviour To Me

authors.author: Blanche Kerr Brock Virgil P. Brock

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For He's a wonderful Savior to me,
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I was lost in sin,
But Jesus took me in.
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I was lost in sin,
But Jesus rescued me.
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
I was bound by fear,
But Jesus set me free.
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
He's a friend so true,
So patient and so kind.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
He's wonderful Savior to me,
Ev'rything I need in Him I always find.
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
He is always near,
To comfort and to cheer.
He's a wonderful Savior to me,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He forgives my sin,
He dries my ev'ry tear,
He's a wonderful Savior to me.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Dearer grows the love
Of Jesus day by day,
He's a wonderful Savior to me,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Sweeter is His grace,
While pressing on my way.
He's a wonderful Savior to me.
